000010 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
000010 00000 00010 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r2 3
000010 00000 00011 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r3 1
100110 00011 00001 00010 00000000000    # swo $r3 $r1 $r2 # memory[1] = $r3
100101 00001 00010 00100 00000000000    # lwo $r1 $r2 $r4  # $r4 = memory[1]
111111 00100  000000000000000000001     # asrt $r4 1

000010 00000 00101 0000000000001001     # addi $r0 $r5 9
000010 00000 00110 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r6 3
000010 00000 00111 0000000000001001     # addi $r0 $r7 9
100110 00111 00101 00110 00000000000    # swo $r7 $r5 $r6 # memory[3] = $r7
100101 00101 00110 01000 00000000000    # lwo $r5 $r6 $r8  # $r8 = memory[3]
111111 01000  000000000000000001001     # asrt $r8 9

111100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
